title: Amazon.com Parser
text: Monitor prices of your products, gather comprehensive information from product cards, track discounts, analyze product popularity

title: Yandex.Market Parser
text: Perform parsing of one of the top product aggregators. You can parse products either by a list of search queries or from a specific category

title: AliExpress Parser
text: Collect data from one of the most popular marketplaces, track prices, ratings, and the number of reviews for the products you're interested in

title: Ebay Parser
text: Input a list of queries and get the data you need in a structured format. Monitor prices and gather all data from product cards
